item.title: All LIVE or soon launching Airdrops and Bounties
item.description:
Airdropped Token or Opportunity Airdrop Date About the airdrop Link
25k USD Trading Competition GameOnUltra (UOS) on Bitfinex 25 Sep at 02:00:01 PM UTC to 7 Oct at 01:59:59 PM UTC Bitfinex is running a trading competition on UOS where the top 10 traders will get UOS tokens of worth between 10k USD (1st prize) to 500 USD (10th prize). The total worth of the UOS prize pool is 25k USD. To take part, you need to create a subaccount and be verified to intermediate level. The subaccount holder can be a different person than the main account holder. Winners are the top traders on the competition leaderboard. more here
Opportunity: Trade DeFi Tokens with NO FEES 14 days after signup The token exchange WhiteBit gives you 14 days of zero-fee trading if you sign up with a shill link. No KYC until 2 BTC/day withdrawal limit, lots of new DeFi projects get listed there. sign up
Markaccy Bounty Launch promo Until 30 September 2020 MKCY is a token that is starting to trade on HOTBIT in September 2020. There are weekly social media bounties that must be reported into the linked bitcointalk thread. report here
item.author: airdrops@altcointrading.net
